title: Constructivist Language Learning Course Based on Podcasts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and intermediate-level language communication skills
context.additional_context: Podcast delivery via a Learning Management System (LMS), project-based assessment implementation, and a digitally equipped environment.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more self-directed language learning strategies using podcast content.
In a constructivist learning environment, podcast materials can be analyzed and applied at least twice to individual/team projects.
Asynchronous language learning activities of at least 80 minutes per week can be designed using digital learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
